pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Tests in Spatial Statistics // Nonparametric test of independence between a pair of spatial objects (random fields, point processes) based on random shifts with torus or variance correction. See Mrkvika et al. (2021) doi:10.1016/j.spasta.2020.100430, Dvok et al. (2022) doi:10.1111/insr.12503, Dvok and Mrkvika (2024) doi:10.1080/10618600.2024.2357626.
